name: Fidget Spinner Collections
description:
Add your favorite Fidget Spinner!
Write your favorite spinner in comments and we will add them in the next update! Add your favorite spinner and create your own and unique collection!

Over 100 Spinners in 1 App
More than 100+ spinners are collected in this game which unite realistic physics of rotations, enjoyable arcade style of the game and pleasant quality of graphics.

Unforgettable emotions
Every new spinner gives you new emotions and feelings, the pleasure it gives is unlimited. Fidget Hand Spinner helps you relax and relieve stress with just a few simple spins. Fidget Spinner is one of present hottest, most fashionable and most eye-catching leisure items.

More than usual plastic spinners
What is Hand Spinner? It's a cool toy that's just twisted in your hands. Its functional is very small, but the pleasure it gives is unlimited. A hand spinner can be twisted in your hand, twist in your pocket, in the subway, in traffic, in class, online ...
A fidget spinner is a toy that sits like a propeller on a person’s finger, with blades that spin around a bearing. Basically a fidget spiner consists of a two or three pronged design with a bearing in its center circular pad. All this are included in a single application. Flick them for fun or for dumping your excess energy now!

Realistic physics gameplay
The game perfectly worked out the physics of rotation. Also there are sounds and effects that mimics how the spinner worked.

Arcade style of game
The game has two modes - "TIME" and "MASTERY".
- «TIME» - Rotate the spinner toy for 20 seconds and get as more score as you can! Try to beat your best score or rpm (revolutions per minute)!
- «MASTERY» - You have 5 swipes to set the best spin you can. Use your hand finger to swipe the spinner right, wait for it to stop and sweep the rewards!

Unique Fidget Spinner Collection
Collect all the different Fidget Spinners and create your own collections. Some will have to be unlocked using coins, but don't worry, you can earn coins every day by climbing daily rewards or playing with your spiner.

Game Features:
- Realistic simulator with authentic spinning physics
- More than one hundred different spinners to choose from
- Unlock the best fidget spinners
- 20+ different backgrounds
- Two different Battle modes to choose from!
- Fun and hypnotic spinning effects
- Game bonuses and a store of unique things
- Easy to play with intuitive touch
- Play with your friends and compete with them and compare your best scores.
- Free game to download
- Play at anywhere & anytime in the most popular games

Customization:
You can customize some features of the game (from the settings option):
* Play or mute the sounds and music
* Enable or disable the vibration
* Language
* Choose your favorite background

Advices and Tips
Here, you can try different spinners for free and spin them for as long as you want!
The free arcade game has statistics where you can see your best fodget spiner records as well as the total spins you have achieved in the end of every game.
